{{Description|There will never be enough heat. Never.}}
'''Pyronado''' is [[Xiangling]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|snapshot|Pyronado DMG|character=Xiangling|snapshottime=at the third swing during casting}}
* Once a Pyronado deals DMG, it has a '''0.6s''' cooldown before being able to deal DMG to the same target again.
** It can deal DMG more than once per rotation if its hitbox remains in contact with an enemy for more than 0.6s. This can be accomplished against enemies with large hurtboxes, or with careful player movement and timing, as the Pyronado moves relative to the player's position.
* Xiangling will perform 3 {{Pyro}} swings in a small area around her at the start of the skill, before summoning the actual Pyronado. If Xiangling's 4th constellation is not unlocked, the Pyronado will hit smaller enemies 7-8 times with no player/enemy movement.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|3|Deepfry}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|4|Slowbake}} With this constellation, Pyronado's total duration is 14 seconds.
* {{Talent Note|constellation|6|Condensed Pyronado}} While the buff is also granted to Xiangling, it does not affect Xiangling's casted Pyronado.
